activities: Logik Systems Inc. produces software related to electronic discovery and document management, and provides a secure, automated, self-driven data processing and hosting solution for electronically stored information. This product is made available to both individual and corporate clients and/or their legal counsel in the process of conducting data auditing, electronic discovery, records management, and/or other related consulting services. Customer users load their own data to the product, and customer users retain control of who has access to their data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Computer Services - (CSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Company employee personal information and customer-supplied data. Customers may securely load their directly to their password-protected account, or may send their data electronically for upload assistance.
recoursemech:
EU Data Protection Authorities for human resources data; 
American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for all other data
